apply_elite_private.label: Apply to an elite private university

success.text: Against all odds, you've been accepted to a prestigious private university! This is a life-changing opportunity, but the financial implications are staggering.

failure.text: You receive a thin envelope. It's a rejection. It's a harsh reminder that these institutions are incredibly selective.

success.text: You've been accepted to the state university! It's a solid, affordable path to a degree.

failure.text: You've been wait-listed and ultimately rejected from the state university. You'll need to consider other options.

success.text: You find a steady job. It doesn't pay much, but it's a reliable source of income. The daily grind begins.

failure.text: The job search is harder than you expected. After weeks of searching, you can only find inconsistent temp work.
